name: 玛格利塔·莫奇奥
name_full: 玛格利塔·莫奇奥 Margherita Morchio
introduction: Italy is one of the rich spots in the world when it comes to performers and artists. The country is celebrated for its contribution to the progress of arts over the years. Margherita Morchio is one of the newest additions to the rich cinematic and artistic world of Italian show business. With her new Netflix show, the 20-year-old actress is trying to plant her foot firmly in the career of her choosing.Margherita Morchio was born on 30 March 2000 to her parents, father Nicola Morchio and mother Enrica Iannicelli. She was raised in Italy, alongside her elder sister, Martina Morchio, with whom she shares an extremely close relationship. There are numerous pictures of the sisters growing up together; the love of the sisters shines through in the affection they have for one another, definitely a feather in the cap for their loving parents.View this post on InstagramE che dire… spero vivamente che questo film vi possa trasportare e far (ri)vivere uno dei periodi più belli ed emozionanti della nostra vita. Grazie a tutti coloro che hanno reso questo viaggio il più pazzo e meraviglioso di sempre e grazie a meg che è stata vicino a me per ben sei settimane, non avrei desiderato compagna migliore. E ovviamente grazie mille al realizzatore di questo bellissimo video che ci ha seguito come un dannato per tutte le riprese😂 @edmondoannoni @francymazzoleni @sofiaviscardi @matildwst @matteo_oscar_giuggioli @brandoppacitto @mathildeilariucciA post shared by Margherita Morchio (@margherita_morchio) on Apr 5, 2018 at 6:04am PDTThe young actress wanted to be in the show business from a young age, and to have all the tools necessary, Margherita started training in 2014. Margherita was only 14 years old when she enrolled in Scuola “Quelli di Grock” Milano and the actress trained there for a few years. She finally got a chance to appear in a movie in 2018, and two years later, she is leading the cast of the new Netflix mystery series.
